ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( CreateDate__c >= DATE(2021,01,01), IF(OR( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource , "Channel Partner"), ISPICKVAL( Walkin_Source__c , "Channel Partner") ),AND(ISBLANK(RW_Broker__c), ISBLANK( RW_Walkin_Channel_Partner__c ) , RW_Apply_Unregistered_Broker__c == false,Walkin_Apply_Unregistered_ChannelPartner__c == false),false), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_opp == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the broker name or enter Unregistered broker details.
